zhoneAponMIB.name: zhoneAponMIB

revisions.description: Added new alarm definitions: LOS PEE SUF OAML LCD
Add OLT line status change trap support.
Modified SerialNumber field from string to integer.
Change MALC-side ONU tables to OLT/ONU. Add far-side ONU tables.

zhoneAponMIB.contactinfo: Postal: Zhone Technologies, Inc. @ Zhone Way 7001 Oakport Street Oakland, CA 94621 USA Toll-Free: +1 877-ZHONE20 (+1 877-946-6320) Tel: +1-510-777-7000 Fax: +1-510-777-7001 E-mail: support@zhone.com
zhoneAponMIB.description: This is the Zhone ATM-PON mib.

zhoneApon.name: zhoneApon
zhoneApon.description: ATM Passive Optical Network-related Zhone MIBs.

zhoneOltConfigEntry.name: zhoneOltConfigEntry
zhoneOltConfigEntry.description: An entry in the Olt Config table.

zhoneOltConfigBip8.name: zhoneOltConfigBip8
zhoneOltConfigBip8.description: Bip8 - Bit Interleave Parity, a procedure whereby each bit of a resulting BIP8 parity byte is a parity bit done across a specific bit position.

zhoneOltConfigHecRxBypass.name: zhoneOltConfigHecRxBypass
zhoneOltConfigHecRxBypass.description: Cyclic Redundancy Check bypass for reception.

zhoneOltConfigDelimiterPattern.name: zhoneOltConfigDelimiterPattern
zhoneOltConfigDelimiterPattern.description: A unique pattern indicating the start of the ATM cell or minislot, which can be used to perform byte synchronization.

zhoneOltConfigLcdAlpha.name: zhoneOltConfigLcdAlpha
zhoneOltConfigLcdAlpha.description: Number of cells in delineation error before the LCD alarm is raised.

zhoneOltConfigLcdDelta.name: zhoneOltConfigLcdDelta
zhoneOltConfigLcdDelta.description: Number of cells received NOT in delineation error required to clear LCD Alarm.

zhoneOltConfigUtopiaDiscard.name: zhoneOltConfigUtopiaDiscard
zhoneOltConfigUtopiaDiscard.description: Discard Utopia cells with HEC errors or arriving on unknown Vpi.

zhoneOltConfigTxSyncBytes.name: zhoneOltConfigTxSyncBytes
zhoneOltConfigTxSyncBytes.description: Enable transmission of sync bytes for ONUs to get their clock from a network source.

zhoneOltConfigMaxPonDistance.name: zhoneOltConfigMaxPonDistance
zhoneOltConfigMaxPonDistance.units: Distance in microseconds, used in the ranging process.

zhoneOltConfigLineStatusChangeTrapEnable.name: zhoneOltConfigLineStatusChangeTrapEnable
zhoneOltConfigLineStatusChangeTrapEnable.description: Enable/disable control for line status traps on this interface.

zhoneOltStatusEntry.name: zhoneOltStatusEntry
zhoneOltStatusEntry.description: An entry in the OLT Status table.

zhoneOltStatusPonAlarmSUF.name: zhoneOltStatusPonAlarmSUF
zhoneOltStatusPonAlarmSUF.description: StartUp Failure - ranging process failed N times. Note that SUF reflects a hardware problem, and does not include cases where the ONU serial number/password are wrong/unknown.

zhoneOltStatusPonAlarmPEE.name: zhoneOltStatusPonAlarmPEE
zhoneOltStatusPonAlarmPEE.description: Physical Equipment Error (received from an ONU.)

zhoneOltStatusLastChange.name: zhoneOltStatusLastChange
zhoneOltStatusLastChange.description: Time of last line status change.

zhoneOltOnuConfigTable.name: zhoneOltOnuConfigTable
zhoneOltOnuConfigTable.description: Optical Network Unit configuration table - MALC side.

zhoneOltOnuConfigEntry.name: zhoneOltOnuConfigEntry
zhoneOltOnuConfigEntry.description: An entry in the ONU Config table.

zhoneOltOnuConfigLineStatusChangeTrapEna.name: zhoneOltOnuConfigLineStatusChangeTrapEnable
zhoneOltOnuConfigLineStatusChangeTrapEna.description: Enable/disable control for line status traps on this interface.

zhoneOltOnuStatusTable.name: zhoneOltOnuStatusTable
zhoneOltOnuStatusTable.description: Optical Network Unit status table - MALC side.

zhoneOltOnuStatusEntry.name: zhoneOltOnuStatusEntry
zhoneOltOnuStatusEntry.description: An entry in the OLT/ONU Status table.

zhoneOnuConfigTable.name: zhoneOnuConfigTable
zhoneOnuConfigTable.description: Configuration information for the far-end (ONU) device.

zhoneOnuConfigEntry.name: zhoneOnuConfigEntry
zhoneOnuConfigEntry.description: An entry in the ONU Config table.

zhoneOnuConfigRfVideo.name: zhoneOnuConfigRfVideo
zhoneOnuConfigRfVideo.description: Used to turn rf video on and off and to read current status of rf video.

zhoneOnuStatusTable.name: zhoneOnuStatusTable
zhoneOnuStatusTable.description: Status and alarm information for the far-end (ONU) device.

zhoneOnuStatusEntry.name: zhoneOnuStatusEntry
zhoneOnuStatusEntry.description: An entry in the ONU Status table.

zhoneOnuStatusAlarmTF.name: zhoneOnuStatusAlarmTF
zhoneOnuStatusAlarmTF.description: Transmitter Failure - The ONU transmitter is declared in failure when there is no nominal backfacet photocurrent or when the drive currents go beyond the maximum specification.

zhoneOnuStatusAlarmLOS.name: zhoneOnuStatusAlarmLOS
zhoneOnuStatusAlarmLOS.description: Loss Of Signal - No valid optical signal. E.g. this can be generated by the logical function (OAML.AND.FRML.AND.LCD).

zhoneOnuStatusAlarmPEE.name: zhoneOnuStatusAlarmPEE
zhoneOnuStatusAlarmPEE.description: Physical Equipment Error - When the ONU receives a PEE message.

zhoneOnuStatusAlarmSUF.name: zhoneOnuStatusAlarmSUF
zhoneOnuStatusAlarmSUF.description: Startup Failure - The ranging of this ONU has failed (see ranging protocol for exact condition).

zhoneOnuStatusAlarmOAML.name: zhoneOnuStatusAlarmOAML
zhoneOnuStatusAlarmOAML.description: PLOAM Cell Loss - When three consecutive PLOAM headers are wrong.

zhoneOnuStatusAlarmLCD.name: zhoneOnuStatusAlarmLCD
zhoneOnuStatusAlarmLCD.description: Loss of Cell Delineation - When seven consecutive ATM cells have an invalid HEC.

zhoneOnuStatusAlarmFRML.name: zhoneOnuStatusAlarmFRML
zhoneOnuStatusAlarmFRML.description: Loss Of Downstream Frame - When the frame bit is 0 for three consecutive frames.

zhoneOnuStatusAlarmERR.name: zhoneOnuStatusAlarmERR
zhoneOnuStatusAlarmERR.description: Block Error Detection - The downstream received BIP8 is compared with the calculated BIP8 on the received stream. The number of differing bits is accumulated in ERR. At regular intervals, the content is sent via REI to the OLT. This interval is programmed by the OLT with a BER_interval_timer message. ERR is renewed at every reception of a downstream PLOAM cell.

zhoneOnuStatusAlarmSD.name: zhoneOnuStatusAlarmSD
zhoneOnuStatusAlarmSD.description: Signal Degraded - Set active when the downstream BER >= 10E-5

zhoneOnuStatusAlarmMEM.name: zhoneOnuStatusAlarmMEM
zhoneOnuStatusAlarmMEM.description: Message Error Message - When the ONU receives an unknown message.

zhoneOnuStatusAlarmDACT.name: zhoneOnuStatusAlarmDACT
zhoneOnuStatusAlarmDACT.description: De-activate PON-ID - It instructs the ONU to deactivate itself.

zhoneOnuStatusAlarmDIS.name: zhoneOnuStatusAlarmDIS
zhoneOnuStatusAlarmDIS.description: Disabled ONU - When the ONU receives a Disable_serial_number message with it's own serial number and the enable flag=0xFF. It stays in this state even after power off.

zhoneOnuStatusAlarmMIS.name: zhoneOnuStatusAlarmMIS
zhoneOnuStatusAlarmMIS.description: Link Mismatching - The ONU detects that the received PST and transmitted PST are different.

zhoneOnuStatusLastChange.name: zhoneOnuStatusLastChange
zhoneOnuStatusLastChange.description: Time of last line status change.

zhoneOltTrafficContainerIndexNext.name: zhoneOltTrafficContainerIndexNext
zhoneOltTrafficContainerIndexNext.description: This object contains an appropriate value to be used for the zhoneOltTrafficContainerIndex when creating entries in the zhoneOltTrafficContainerTable. The value 0 indicates that no unassigned entries are available. To obtain the zhoneOltTrafficContainerIndex value for a new entry, the manager issues a management protocol retrieval operation to obtain the current value of this object. After each retrieval, the agent should modify the value to the next unassigned index. After a manager retrieves a value the agent will determine through its local policy when this index value will be made available for reuse.

zhoneOltTrafficContainerTable.name: zhoneOltTrafficContainerTable
zhoneOltTrafficContainerTable.description: Traffic Container definitions for the OLT.

zhoneOltTrafficContainerIndex.name: zhoneOltTrafficContainerIndex
zhoneOltTrafficContainerIndex.description: A unique value to identify this traffic container entry.

zhoneOltTrafficContainerGuaranteedBW.name: zhoneOltTrafficContainerGuaranteedBW
zhoneOltTrafficContainerGuaranteedBW.description: The maximum guareented bandwidth is downstream bit rate divided by number of ONUs. For this incarnation, it is 622 / 32 = 19.4

zhoneOltTrafficContainerMaximumBW.name: zhoneOltTrafficContainerMaximumBW
zhoneOltTrafficContainerMaximumBW.description: Maximum bandwidth for a PON channel. The maximum bandwidth is downstream bit rate divided by the number of ONUs. For this incarnation, it is 622 / 32 = 19.4

zhoneOltTrafficContainerCBR.name: zhoneOltTrafficContainerCBR
zhoneOltTrafficContainerCBR.description: Constant Bit Rate - describes the nature of the traffic on the channel. A TRUE setting implies that the data stream will be of a constant nature. FALSE implies that the traffic will be bursty.

zhoneOltTrafficContainerCbrCompensate.name: zhoneOltTrafficContainerCbrCompensate
zhoneOltTrafficContainerCbrCompensate.description: A flag for ranging compensation. When a ranging window is opened, the Grant Handler appends to the end of the ranging window all the grants missed due to the ranging window by CBR flows with the compensation flag set.

zhoneOltTrafficContainerRowStatus.name: zhoneOltTrafficContainerRowStatus
zhoneOltTrafficContainerRowStatus.description: Row status of the traffic container entry. This field must be initially set to 'createAndGo'.

zhoneOltLineStatusChangeTrap.name: zhoneOltLineStatusChangeTrap
zhoneOltLineStatusChangeTrap.description: Line status change trap for the OLT APON interface.

zhoneOnuLineStatusChangeTrap.name: zhoneOnuLineStatusChangeTrap
zhoneOnuLineStatusChangeTrap.description: Line status change trap for a particular Onu APON interface.
